attributes.action: Deploy the Navy in the Channel to block and return all illegal immigrants.
attributes.additional_details: To protect our country and the safety of everyone in the UK. Mass illegal immigration is a threat to our way of life and innocent British people.
attributes.background: Deploy and position the Navy in the Channel to block and return all illegal immigrants back to France.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Deploy the Royal Navy to help stop illegal immigrants entering the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701998
